::Slayer::

Slayer could still detect the bots, and he wished he had a cloaking 
device. Although maybe he could lure them to another faction's 
territory... The only faction he knew the base of well was the 
Alliance, since he had just had a battle there.

He turns, now heading toward the Alliance base.
